attributes.action: Stop ITV hosting England football World Cup or Euro games.
attributes.additional_details:
England have won 57.1% on the BBC compared to 31.6% on the itv. This is a national disgrace. We must support the national team and strip the ITV from England rights. The BBC are funded by the TV license fee and winning the World Cup would be a great use of the money.

Examples are:
England vs Belgium 2018
England v Iceland 2016
attributes.background: All England games should be hosted by the BBC as England get better results.
